short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a warning over phishing/scam websites targetting Ethereum users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EtherSafe makes sure you never get your private key, credentials or private data stolen by scamming and phishing websites spreading in the Ethereum community.


Source: https://github.com/EtherSafe/EtherSafe
Twitter: @EtherSafeTeam
